mapper.insert: INSERT INTO searchlog (date, searchTimes, connection0, connection1, connection2, average0, average1, average2) VALUES (curdate(), 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE searchTimes = searchTimes + 1;
mapper.update: UPDATE searchlog SET ${averageColumn} = (${averageColumn} * ${connectionColumn} + #{latency}) / (${connectionColumn} + 1), ${connectionColumn} = ${connectionColumn} + 1 WHERE date = curdate();
